description: An old lady who lost 3 sons in battle. In her grief, she trampled upon the Kaiser`s portrait -- and was seen and denounced by a neighbour. Captured by the military police, she was saved from torture and death by the actions of http://anidb.net/ch208 [Ulrich Kesler]. Sentenced to exile, she went on a hunger strike and died shortly thereafter.
name: Roufujin
